name: Passed Out: Desert Rally
description:
Hello everyone,

Here is a short prototype of my racing game "Passed Out: Desert Rally", made in few weeks, there is still A LOT of things to add.

But there is the basics: 2 raceships you can choose from and one track to race on.

[CONTROLLERS ONLY]

I hope you will enjoy this tiny prototype, I will add more things in the future,

thank you for your time <3
